reviewText: This is the most honest ,raw  and fascinating DVD I have seen to date! Ravi  reaches into our souls  with a mirror to reflect back at us  what it is we truly seek  and how it will  ultimately destroy us !  Ravi has a  riveting level of intelligence  mixed with a genuine compassion and gentleness! Not to mention he has a  quite satisfying sense of humor !Buy  several copies you'll be glad you did !
